### Data:
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
data = read.csv("rankings.csv")
head(data)
new_data = data[1:100, ]

# https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/alitaqi000/world-university-rankings-2023
ggplot(new_data, aes(x = University.Rank, y = Research.Score)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE, color = "red") +
  labs(x = "University Rank", y = "Research Score") +
  ggtitle("Univeristy Rank vs Research Score")

new_data <- transform(data, University.Rank = as.numeric(as.factor(University.Rank)))
new_data <- transform(new_data, Research.Score = as.numeric(as.factor(Research.Score)))

correlation = cor(new_data$University.Rank, new_data$Research.Score)
correlation

```
